channel.title: Please Help
channel.description: On my website, all these ads come up. Is there a way to stop them? Besides just like, buying add-free things. Also I have a pop-up blocker and it still keeps coming up.

item.title: Please Help
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

DragonGuild:

On my website, all these ads come up. Is there a way to stop them? Besides just like, buying add-free things. Also I have a pop-up blocker and it still keeps coming up.

You own a company u say Xele Ltd? and you can’t pay 1$ a year to stop ad’s or host the forum your self? thats pathetic.

anyways look into apache http server and php + forum scripts

Read full topic
